## Migration map

```{r}
setwd(here::here("Electricity-control-groups"))

df_to_join <- read_rds("df_to_join.rds")
st_map <- read_rds("st_map.rds")
el_paishes_1930 <- read_rds("el_paishes_1930.rds")

st_map_with_el_parished <- st_map %>%
  mutate(parish_code = as.numeric(str_sub(ref_code.x, 4, 12))) %>%
  left_join(df_to_join)

st_map_with_el_parished %>% 
  inner_join(direct_electricity_job_locations)


st_map_with_el_parished %>% 
  ggplot() +
  geom_sf(aes(fill = iline))



direct_electricity_job_locations <- readRDS("~/Recon/SC-1930/data/temp/direct_electricity_job_locations.rds")
indirect_electricity_job_locations <- readRDS("~/Recon/SC-1930/data/temp/indirect_electricity_job_locations.rds")
```
